trans-unit.source: This information is available in your Google Analytics account. Google Analytics 4 tracking ID starts with "G-".
trans-unit.target: Aceste informatii sunt disponibile in contul tau de Google Analytics. Codul de urmarire pentru Google Analytics 4 incepe cu „G-”.

trans-unit.source: This option adds unique user ID to the tag to better track the customer. Use this option only if it complies with laws in your country.
trans-unit.target: Aceasta optiune adauga un cod de utilizator unic la eticheta pentru a urmari mai bine clientul. Utilizeaza aceasta optiune numai daca respecta legile din tara ta.

trans-unit.source: Use this option to anonymize the visitor’s IP to comply with data privacy laws in some countries
trans-unit.target: Foloseste aceasta optiune pentru a anonimiza adresa IP a vizitatorilor, pentru conformarea cu legile pentru confidentialitatea datelor din anumite tari

trans-unit.source: Use this option to enable the tracking inside the back -office
trans-unit.target: Activeaza această optiune pentru a activa urmarirea in Back Office

trans-unit.source: Choose order states in which you consider the given order canceled. This will usually be the default "Canceled" state, but some stores may have extra states like "Returned", etc.
trans-unit.target: Alege stadiile de comanda in care consideri comanda ca fiind anulata. Comanda anulata va avea de obicei doar stadiul implicit "Anulat", dar unele magazine pot avea stadii suplimentare precum "Returnat" etc.

trans-unit.source: This option will resend all orders that failed to be sent normally in the front office, due to failures or ad-blockers.
trans-unit.target: Aceasta optiune va retrimite toate comenzile care nu au putut fi trimise normal din magazin, din cauza problemelor tehnice sau ad-blocker-elor.

trans-unit.source: If you want to resend failed orders, specify how many days back the module should look for them. Default: 30.
trans-unit.target: Daca vrei sa retrimiti comenzile esuate, specifica aici cate zile in urma va cauta modulul. Implicit: 30.

trans-unit.source: Use this option to enable the tracking inside the Back Office
trans-unit.target: Activeaza această optiune pentru a porni urmarirea in paginile din Back Office

trans-unit.source: This option will resend all orders that failed to be sent normally in front-office, due to failures or ad-blockers.
trans-unit.target: Aceasta optiune va retrimite toate comenzile care nu au putut fi trimise normal din magazin, din cauza problemelor tehnice sau ad-blocker-elor.

trans-unit.source: Gain clear insights into important metrics about your customers, using Google Analytics
trans-unit.target: Obtine perspective clare in masuratorile importante despre clientii tai., folosind Google Analytics

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to uninstall Google Analytics? You will lose all the data related to this module.
trans-unit.target: Sigur doresti sa dezinstalezi Google Analytics? Vei pierde toate datele legate de acest modul.

trans-unit.source: Your customers go everywhere; shouldn't your analytics.
trans-unit.target: Clientii tai sunt peste tot; analizele tale trebuie sa fie in stare sa-i urmareasca.

trans-unit.source: Google Analytics shows you the full customer picture across ads and videos, websites and social tools, tables and smartphones. That makes it easier to serve your current customers and win new ones.
trans-unit.target: Google Analytics va arata imaginea completa a clientului de la reclame la videoclipuri, de la site-uri la instrumente sociale, de la tablete la smartphone-uri. Aceasta va usureaza servirea clientilor actuali si castigarea de clienti noi.

trans-unit.source: With ecommerce functionality in Google Analytics you can gain clear insight into important metrics about shopper behavior and conversion, including:
trans-unit.target: Cu functionalitatea de e-comert din Google Analytics poti obtine o perspectiva clara in masuratorile importante despre comportamentul si conversia cumparatorilor, inclusiv:

trans-unit.source: Create your account to get started
Merchants are able to understand how far along users get in the buying process and where they are dropping off.
trans-unit.target: Comerciantii sunt capabili sa inteleaga cat de mult parcurg utilizatorii din procesul de cumparare si din ce cauze renunta.
